    public class ViewPostDetailsActivity
extends ServerBaseActivity
    This activity class handles the viewing of a post and commenting on the post
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Danny Chan Yu Tian

      private ViewPostDetailsAdapter adapter
      Adapter object for viewPostDetailsRecyclerView.
      private android.widget.EditText CommentEditText
      Contains text data to be sent upon user tapping SendCommentButton.

      Handles the loading of comment messages into the adapter.

      Retrieve the selected Post details and assign them to a post object.

      Retrieves the username of the current user.

      Retrieves all user in server and their exp into HashMap to be sent to Adapter.

      Contains the post ID of the current viewed post.

      Retrieves all member titles for the current server and loads it into the adapter.

      Initial scroll boolean.

      Triggers sending of comment data to the postmessage.

      Contain the list of titles for the server.

      Contains the comment sender userExp.

      Contains the list of user and their Exp

        Adapter object for viewPostDetailsRecyclerView.

        Contains the current user username. Used to send commments.

        Contains the comment sender userExp.

      • viewPostDetailsRecyclerView

        private androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView viewPostDetailsRecyclerView
        Displays post details and comments of the current post. Uses ViewPostDetailsAdapter as its adapter.
        See Also:
        ViewPostDetailsAdapter

      • CommentEditText

        private android.widget.EditText CommentEditText
        Contains text data to be sent upon user tapping SendCommentButton.

      • SendCommentButton

        private android.widget.ImageButton SendCommentButton
        Triggers sending of comment data to the postmessage.

      • getUsername

        private com.google.firebase.database.ValueEventListener getUsername
        Retrieves the username of the current user. Database Path: root/users/(currentUser.getUid())/_username Usage: Single ValueEventListener

      • mapUsersToExp

        com.google.firebase.database.ValueEventListener mapUsersToExp
        Retrieves all user in server and their exp into HashMap to be sent to Adapter. Database Path: root/members/(serverId) Usage: ValueEventListener

      • getPostDetails

        private com.google.firebase.database.ValueEventListener getPostDetails
        Retrieve the selected Post details and assign them to a post object. Database Path: root/posts/(serverId)/(postID) Usage: ValueEventListener

      • retrieveMemberTitles

        private com.google.firebase.database.ValueEventListener retrieveMemberTitles
        Retrieves all member titles for the current server and loads it into the adapter. Database Path: root/titles/(serverId) Usage: ValueEventListener

      • commentMessageListener

        private com.google.firebase.database.ChildEventListener commentMessageListener
        Handles the loading of comment messages into the adapter. Database Path: root/postmessages/(serverId)/(postID) Usage: ChildEventListener
